channel.title: Two simple questions.. pk hits and duel arena bug
channel.description:
okay 1. when you kill someone in the duel arena what happens is the person that does not die stays in duel arena even if not doing the click when other dies glitch no matter what they stay in and cant tele
2. how can i lower how hard weapons hit i mean every weapon in my server hits high so its not the weapon stats

item.title: Two simple questions.. pk hits and duel arena bug
item.dc:creator: @thewindman78 thewindman78
item.description:
@thewindman78 wrote:

[quote=“P A N I C, post:2, topic:388640”]2. item.cdf
Search item name then stats are there.
slash etc.[/quote] huh? i mean like okay your hp is out of 99 all my wepons hit like 500 and above ags and alot of items can hit 99s i mean pks are over in like 2 hits

Read full topic
item.source: Two simple questions.. pk hits and duel arena bug
